channel.title: Wtf? [PI]
channel.description:
Er.. Help? Error Code: [code] ChaosX's Client: Initialized. # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8475f6, pid=3096, t id=5324 # # JRE version: 6.0_22-b04 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.1-b03 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x575f6] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\sheri\Desktop\ChaosX\ChaosX Server\ChaosX Client\hs_err_pid3096.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . . [/code] It'll run for a few minutes, then crashes.. I don't understand.
The .txt file it saved too. http://pastebin.com/rNjYA5my

item.title: Wtf? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Er… Help?
Error Code:

ChaosX's Client: Initialized.
#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8475f6, pid=3096, t
id=5324
#

# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.1-b03 mixed mode windows-amd64
)
# Problematic frame:
# V  [jvm.dll+0x575f6]

#   http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp

Press any key to continue . . .

It’ll run for a few minutes, then crashes… I don’t understand.

The .txt file it saved too.
http://pastebin.com/rNjYA5my

Read full topic
